item.title: Delta to pi int
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Ok i need help converting a lil bit of this i originally started with this

if(i == ****) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = Drop;//drop class8.anInt181 = 1200; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset; class8.anInt194 = -1; // model offset; increase to move up class8.anInt165 = EQUIP; class8.anInt200 = EQUIP; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Korasi's sword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "The sword of a void knight.".getBytes(); class8.aByte205 = -11; class8.aByte154 = -11; }

Now i have converted it to this but i dont know how to convert the rest.

case 16065: itemDef.actions[]; = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[];[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.modelID; = Drop; itemDef.modelZoom; = 1200; itemDef.modelRotation1; = 498; itemDef.modelRotation2; = 1300; itemDef.modelOffset1; = -1; itemDef.modelOffset2; = -1; class8.anInt165 = EQUIP; class8.anInt200 = EQUIP; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; itemDef.name; = "Korasi's sword"; itemDef.description; = "The sword of a void knight.".getBytes(); class8.aByte205 = -11; class8.aByte154 = -11; break;
